name: emoji
description: Get information about a built-in or custom emoji
optionsEmojiDescription: The emoji to get information about
optionsVariantDescription: The variant of the emoji, if built-in
invalidEmoji: That doesn't seem to be either a custom Discord emoji, or a supported built-in emoji. Please try another emoji.
unsupportedEmoji: The emoji exists, however, the variant's source does not support it. Please try another variant or emoji.
invalidDiscordEmoji: The custom emoji you specified does not appear to exist in Discord's database, please try another emoji.
noContent: I could not retrieve the message's emojis because it has no content.
noEmojis: I could not find any emojis in the message.
